description: a(n+1) = a(n) + sum of digits in base 4 representation of a(n), with a(0) = 1.
references: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, Section 2.24.
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for Colombian or self numbers and related sequences
prog: (Haskell)a010065 n = a010065_list !! na010065_list = iterate a230631 1  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 20 2015
author: _Leonid Broukhis_
extensions: More terms from Neven Juric, Apr 11 2008
